mapper.sql: ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS_NAME, ADDRESS_CODE, ADDRESS_LEVEL, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE
mapper.select: select ADDRESS_CODE from T_ADDRESS where ADDRESS_CODE like #{_parameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ADDRESS_LEVEL=3
mapper.insert: insert into T_ADDRESS (ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS_NAME, ADDRESS_CODE, ADDRESS_LEVEL, PROVINCE_CODE, CITY_CODE, COUNTY_CODE) values (#{addressId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addressName,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{addressCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{addressLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ADDRESS_ID,

mapper.update:
update T_ADDRESS
ADDRESS_NAME = #{addressName,jdbcType=OTHER},
ADDRESS_CODE = #{addressCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS_LEVEL = #{addressLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_ADDRESS set ADDRESS_NAME = #{addressName,jdbcType=OTHER}, ADDRESS_CODE = #{addressCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESS_LEVEL = #{addressLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
